long_description: Ortlieb Packman Pro 2 cycling backpack delivers stout protection from the elements thanks to its waterproof fabric and roll-top closure, making it great for commuting and more. Made of tough, long-lasting waterproof coated nylon fabric; pack top rolls down to protect and secure load, and closes with adjustable, quick-release buckles. Back, hip and shoulder straps are padded and have breathable mesh fabric to ensure carrying comfort; anatomically shaped inner stiffener protects your back and adds stability. Waist and sternum straps adjust the fit; side compression straps secure your load. Front neoprene zip pocket is made from stretchy fabric; it is not waterproof. Interior pocket holds a hydration system and includes a pass-through for a hydration tube (hydration system not included). Additional internal zip pocket secures valuables and small essentials. Packman Pro 2 includes a removable holder for your bike helmet; pack features a zip storage pocket for helmet holder. Reflective highlights improve nighttime visibility.
short_description: Ortlieb Packman Pro 2 cycling backpack delivers stout protection from the elements thanks to its waterproof fabric and roll-top closure, making it great for commuting and more.
